title: Gujarat aims for 100 GW renewable energy by 2030: CM Bhupendra Patel
description: Gujarat Chief Minister Bhupendra Patel on Tuesday launched the 'Mission 100 GW of renewable energy in Gujarat' during the second day of 4th Global Renewable Energy Investor's Meet (RE-INVEST) 2024.
